channel.title: Openstack on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Openstack on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

description.p: So last week I started to look into learning the new composable services and roles that was added to Newton. I previously learned a little bit about deploying OpenStack clouds when I did training after joining Red Hat, but that was based on Liberty, and a lot has changed in TripleO since that time.
